rooms.description: A welcoming entry hall that adheres to Vastu principles with a north-east orientation for positive energy. The space is designed to be minimalist yet elegant, typical of Chettinad style.
A spacious living area positioned towards the south-west corner to maintain a flow of natural light and air circulation, decorated in traditional Chettinad aesthetics with modern finishes.
Compact yet functional kitchen placed on the north-west side ensuring adherence to Vastu guidelines for food preparation and positive energy flow.
The master bedroom is located in the south-east corner with an attached en-suite bathroom, designed with Chettinad detailing and ample space for comfort.
En-suite Bathroom for Master Bedroom, aligned with Vastu guidelines ensuring privacy and proper placement of water elements.
A serene open courtyard in the center of the floor plan providing ventilation, natural light, and a connection with nature, central to Vastu design principles.

openings.description: Located on the north-east side for optimal positive energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Provides access to the central courtyard and allows natural light into adjacent living areas.
